attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2016-0691

Date: 2016-07-18

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes the employment conditions of John R. McDougall, President of the National Research Council of Canada, as set out in the annexed schedule.

 


Sur recommandation du premier ministre, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil fixe les conditions d’emploi de John R. McDougall, président du Conseil national de recherches du Canada, conformément à l’annexe ci-jointe.

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, fixes the employment conditions of John R. McDougall, President of the National Research Council of Canada, as set out in the annexed schedule.
